html:
10.12.18  10:47 am   "wait a minute why do i have time to be at a party, i'm trying to do 10 weeks of work every 2 weeks "

Are you stressed out?
10.12.18  8:06 am   how to make breakfast
10.12.18  7:57 am   Is it legitimate to take words that don't rhyme and make them rhyme for the sake of a song
10.12.18  7:56 am   what two words would you never try to use in a song?
10.12.18  7:46 am   hey bill what are you having for dinner tonight

10.12.18  7:38 am   10.12.18  1:32 am isn't it sad how making all this crazy content only makes you temporarily happy? Like barely.

      You finish it on time and you think "it's good enough" (because you said in the past that to make a truly perfect song/video you would have to spend your whole life just touching up tiny details, and you don't have that kind of time)

      and then right after releasing your content you forget about it and move on to the next thing. I guess my question is: Do you really never stop for a second to appreciate what you've created?
10.12.18  7:09 am   Why do I keep having bad dreams?
10.12.18  5:48 am   should I stay hopeful even if it may seem that lots of hope have been lost for me?
10.12.18  3:02 am   Have you switched back to answering questions in the morning instead of the evening?
10.12.18  2:32 am   I am sick and sleepless and miserable right now. Could you remind me of something beautiful in the universe?
10.12.18  1:32 am   What's your favorite song you produced so far?
10.12.18  12:10 am   Pigeons?

10.11.18  9:55 pm   Would you ever make a joy of painting style show??
10.11.18  9:18 pm   10.10.18  3:44 pm     Freedom from what?

10.11.18  9:10 pm   What are your feelings towards there being different genres of music?

     I mean, it helps organize it, but it seems somewhat limiting, especially when something seems in between different genres, or doesn't really fit any pre-existing genre.   Shouldn't music be allowed to be as free as, well, music.

     But it can help one express what a certain song is like.
10.11.18  9:08 pm   How do you learn improv?  I'm classically trained and cannot function without sheet music.
10.11.18  9:07 pm   When are we going to get a look at your vast collection of goats
10.11.18  8:53 pm   where the ideal place to listen to your music
10.11.18  8:41 pm   why the darn are your song so hecking catchy?? gosh!
10.11.18  8:37 pm   What is the greatest mystery of life?
10.11.18  8:35 pm   What's the title for the next video
10.11.18  8:34 pm   Who inspired you to use this design on your website?

10.11.18  8:23 pm   I posted some artwork then got embarrassed and deleted it.  But then I discovered someone had said something nice about it right before I deleted it.  Now his comment in just hanging out there in space attached to nothing.  What do I do now?
10.11.18  8:17 pm   What is your policy on capital letters? Do you have anything in particular, or do you just use them when they seem necessary?

10.11.18  8:04 pm   Seeing as New Canaan was based on a real event, could you give us some background? Why did you go to New Canaan? What were you thinking about during the time that prompted you to make it a song? Is "you" anybody in particular? Thanks.

10.11.18  7:32 pm   if you miraculously completed all the hundreds projects and songs you've ever planned on doing right now what do you think you would do next?  would you begin writing new songs and projects, and if so, why?
10.11.18  7:24 pm   sometimes when i wake up my first thought is "eat chicken for breakfast" what does it mean
10.11.18  7:09 pm   what is your favorite type of milk?
10.11.18  6:18 pm   is there a particular video that you've made that you like the most?
10.11.18  6:15 pm   Why don't you post in your notebook on here anymore?
10.11.18  5:18 pm   I'm flattered that you write so many songs about me but have you considered indulging and writing a couple more about yourself?

10.11.18  5:08 pm   i went outside crying and the wind sent a teensy twister into my yard that made me laugh, and as soon as i laughed it tossed leaves high in the air and completely stopped. how much of a fruit bat am i for thinking i created it?
10.11.18  4:56 pm   Should i lock up the rainbow for its crimes
10.11.18  3:56 pm   What is the circle of fifths and what is it used for?
10.11.18  3:50 pm   Will you ever make extended versions of previous short songs?
10.11.18  3:16 pm   what's the importantest thing in life

10.11.18  3:01 pm   Hi Bill just figured this out and I'm excited; triplets are when you fit three notes into the space of two of those same notes. So like

3 eighth notes in 2 eighth notes (=1
quarter note

3 quarter notes in 2 quarter notes (=1 half note)

Which is interesting because we call them triplets, which suggests that they are three parts of one thing. They are thirds. But it's kinda 2/3, if you're going note-ratio wise-so do you think they should really be called two-thirdlets?

      Or do you have some grander musical wisdom to lead you to a different conclusion?

10.11.18  2:14 pm   I feel like school is sucking the creativity out of me because It makes me feel like I have to do things a certain way but I know there are other ways to do things and it feels like I am becoming less capable of combating this have you ever gone through anything like this?

      if you have do you have any advice?
10.11.18  2:00 pm   Do your songs have a specific meaning you are trying to convey or are we meant to find our own meaning in them?
